verses.verse: At that time <S%G2540><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> on the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the grainfields, <S%G4702><s%> and His disciples <S%G3101><s%> became hungry <S%G3983><s%> and began <S%G757><s%> to pick <S%G5089><s%> the heads <S%G4719><s%> [of grain] and eat. <S%G2068><s%>

But when the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> it, they said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Your disciples <S%G3101><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> on a Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>"

But He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Have you not read <S%G314><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> David <S%G7035><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he became hungry, <S%G3983><s%> he and his companions <S%G3588><s%>; <S%G3326><s%>

how <S%G4459><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and they ate <S%G2068><s%> the consecrated <S%G4286><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was not lawful <S%G1832><s%> for him to eat, <S%G2068><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> for those <S%G3588><s%> with him, but for the priests <S%G2409><s%> alone <S%G3441><s%>?

"Or <S%G2228><s%> have you not read <S%G314><s%> in the Law, <S%G3551><s%> that on the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> the priests <S%G2409><s%> in the temple <S%G2413><s%> break <S%G953><s%> the Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> and are innocent <S%G338><s%>?
"But I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that something greater <S%G3173><s%> than the temple <S%G2413><s%> is here. <S%G5602><s%>

"But if <S%G1487><s%> you had known <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> this means, <S%G1510><s%> 'I desire <S%G2309><s%> compassion, <S%G1656><s%> and not a sacrifice, <S%G2378><s%>' you would not have condemned <S%G2613><s%> the innocent. <S%G338><s%>
"For the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is Lord <S%G2962><s%> of the Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>"
And departing <S%G3327><s%> from there, <S%G1564><s%> He went <S%G2064><s%> into their synagogue. <S%G4864><s%>

And behold, <S%G2400><s%> [there was] a man <S%G444><s%> with a withered <S%G3584><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%> And they questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> to heal <S%G2323><s%> on the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%>?" â€“ in order <S%G2443><s%> that they might accuse <S%G2723><s%> Him.

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "What <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> shall there be among <S%G1537><s%> you, who <S%G3739><s%> shall have <S%G2192><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sheep, <S%G4263><s%> and if <S%G1437><s%> it falls <S%G1706><s%> into a pit <S%G999><s%> on the Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> will he not take <S%G2902><s%> hold <S%G2902><s%> of it, and lift <S%G1453><s%> it out?

"Of how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G1308><s%> value <S%G1308><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> is a man <S%G444><s%> than a sheep! <S%G4263><s%> So <S%G5620><s%> then, <S%G5620><s%> it is lawful <S%G1832><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2573><s%> on the Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to the man, <S%G444><s%> "Stretch <S%G1614><s%> out your hand! <S%G5495><s%>" And he stretched <S%G1614><s%> it out, and it was restored <S%G600><s%> to normal, <S%G5199><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> the other. <S%G243><s%>

But the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out, and counseled <S%G4824><s%> <S%G2983><s%> together <S%G4824><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> Him, [as to] how <S%G3704><s%> they might destroy <S%G622><s%> Him.

But Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> aware <S%G1097><s%> of [this,] withdrew <S%G402><s%> from there. <S%G1564><s%> And many <S%G4183><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> Him, and He healed <S%G2323><s%> them all, <S%G3956><s%>
and warned <S%G2008><s%> them not to make <S%G4160><s%> Him known, <S%G5318><s%>
in order <S%G2443><s%> that what <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G3004><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"Behold, <S%G2400><s%> My Servant <S%G3816><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have chosen; <S%G140><s%> My Beloved <S%G27><s%> in whom <S%G3739><s%> My soul <S%G5590><s%> is well-pleased; I will put <S%G5087><s%> My Spirit <S%G4151><s%> upon Him, And He shall proclaim <S%G518><s%> justice <S%G2920><s%> to the Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>
"He will not quarrel, <S%G2051><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> cry <S%G2905><s%> out; Nor <S%G3761><s%> will anyone <S%G5100><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> His voice <S%G5456><s%> in the streets. <S%G4116><s%>

"A battered <S%G4937><s%> reed <S%G2563><s%> He will not break <S%G2608><s%> off, And a smoldering <S%G5188><s%> wick <S%G3043><s%> He will not put <S%G4570><s%> out, Until <S%G2193><s%> He leads <S%G1544><s%> justice <S%G2920><s%> to victory. <S%G3534><s%>
"And in His name <S%G3686><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> will hope. <S%G1679><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> there was brought <S%G4374><s%> to Him a demon-possessed man [who was] blind <S%G5185><s%> and dumb, <S%G2974><s%> and He healed <S%G2323><s%> him, so <S%G5620><s%> that the dumb <S%G2974><s%> man <S%G2974><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> and saw. <S%G991><s%>

And all <S%G3956><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> were amazed, <S%G1839><s%> and [began] to say, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> [man] cannot <S%G3385><s%> be the Son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G7035><s%> can he?"

But when the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, they said, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> casts <S%G1544><s%> out demons <S%G1140><s%> only <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> by Beelzebul <S%G954><s%> the ruler <S%G758><s%> of the demons. <S%G1140><s%>"

And knowing <S%G3609><s%> their thoughts <S%G1761><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Any <S%G3956><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> itself <S%G1438><s%> is laid <S%G2049><s%> waste; <S%G2049><s%> and any <S%G3956><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> itself <S%G1438><s%> shall not stand <S%G2476><s%>.

"And if <S%G1487><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> casts <S%G1544><s%> out Satan, <S%G4567><s%> he is divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> himself; <S%G1438><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> shall his kingdom <S%G932><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%>?

"And if <S%G1487><s%> I by Beelzebul <S%G954><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> out demons, <S%G1140><s%> by whom <S%G5101><s%> do your sons <S%G5207><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> them out? Consequently <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> they shall be your judges. <S%G2923><s%>

"But if <S%G1487><s%> I cast <S%G1544><s%> out demons <S%G1140><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> then <S%G686><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has come <S%G5348><s%> upon you.

"Or <S%G2228><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> the strong <S%G2478><s%> man's house <S%G3614><s%> and carry <S%G726><s%> off <S%G726><s%> his property, <S%G4632><s%> unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> he first <S%G4413><s%> binds <S%G1210><s%> the strong <S%G2478><s%> [man]? And then <S%G5119><s%> he will plunder <S%G1283><s%> his house. <S%G3614><s%>
"He who is not with Me is against <S%G2596><s%> Me; and he who does not gather <S%G4863><s%> with Me scatters. <S%G4650><s%>

"Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, any <S%G3956><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> and blasphemy <S%G988><s%> shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> but blasphemy <S%G988><s%> against the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> shall not be forgiven. <S%G863><s%>

"And whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall speak <S%G3004><s%> a word <S%G3056><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man, <S%G444><s%> it shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> him; but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall speak <S%G3004><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> it shall not be forgiven <S%G863><s%> him, either <S%G3777><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> age, <S%G165><s%> or <S%G3777><s%> in the [age] to come. <S%G3195><s%>

"Either <S%G2228><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> the tree <S%G1186><s%> good, <S%G2570><s%> and its fruit <S%G2590><s%> good; <S%G2570><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> the tree <S%G1186><s%> bad, <S%G4550><s%> and its fruit <S%G2590><s%> bad; <S%G4550><s%> for the tree <S%G1186><s%> is known <S%G1097><s%> by its fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

"You brood <S%G1081><s%> of vipers, <S%G2191><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> you, being <S%G1510><s%> evil, <S%G4190><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> what is good <S%G18><s%>? For the mouth <S%G4750><s%> speaks <S%G2980><s%> out of that which <S%G4051><s%> fills <S%G4051><s%> the heart. <S%G2588><s%>

"The good <S%G18><s%> man <S%G444><s%> out of [his] good <S%G18><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> brings <S%G1544><s%> forth <S%G1544><s%> what is good; <S%G18><s%> and the evil <S%G4190><s%> man <S%G444><s%> out of [his] evil <S%G4190><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> brings <S%G1544><s%> forth <S%G1544><s%> what is evil. <S%G4190><s%>

"And I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that every <S%G3956><s%> careless <S%G692><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> that men <S%G444><s%> shall speak, <S%G2980><s%> they shall render <S%G591><s%> account <S%G3056><s%> for it in the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment. <S%G2920><s%>
"For by your words <S%G3056><s%> you shall be justified, <S%G1344><s%> and by your words <S%G3056><s%> you shall be condemned. <S%G2613><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> we want <S%G2309><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> a sign <S%G4592><s%> from You."

But He answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "An evil <S%G4190><s%> and adulterous <S%G3428><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> craves <S%G1934><s%> for a sign; <S%G4592><s%> and [yet] no <S%G3756><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> shall be given <S%G1325><s%> to it but the sign <S%G4592><s%> of Jonah <S%G2495><s%> the prophet; <S%G4396><s%>

for just <S%G5618><s%> as Jonah <S%G2495><s%> was three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and three <S%G5140><s%> nights <S%G3571><s%> in the belly <S%G2836><s%> of the sea <S%G2785><s%> monster, <S%G2785><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> be three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and three <S%G5140><s%> nights <S%G3571><s%> in the heart <S%G2588><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

"The men <S%G435><s%> of Nineveh <S%G3536><s%> shall stand <S%G450><s%> up with this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> at the judgment, <S%G2920><s%> and shall condemn <S%G2632><s%> it because <S%G3754><s%> they repented <S%G3340><s%> at the preaching <S%G2782><s%> of Jonah; <S%G2495><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> something greater <S%G4183><s%> than Jonah <S%G2495><s%> is here. <S%G5602><s%>

"[The] Queen <S%G938><s%> of [the] South <S%G3558><s%> shall rise <S%G1453><s%> up with this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> at the judgment <S%G2920><s%> and shall condemn <S%G2632><s%> it, because <S%G3754><s%> she came <S%G2064><s%> from the ends <S%G4009><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of Solomon; <S%G4672><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> something greater <S%G4183><s%> than Solomon <S%G4672><s%> is here. <S%G5602><s%>

"Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> goes <S%G1831><s%> out of a man, <S%G444><s%> it passes <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> waterless <S%G504><s%> places, <S%G5117><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> rest, <S%G372><s%> and does not find <S%G2147><s%> [it.]

"Then <S%G5119><s%> it says, <S%G3004><s%> 'I will return <S%G1994><s%> to my house <S%G3624><s%> from which <S%G3606><s%> I came <S%G1831><s%>'; and when it comes, <S%G2064><s%> it finds <S%G2147><s%> it unoccupied, <S%G4980><s%> swept, <S%G4563><s%> and put <S%G2885><s%> in order. <S%G2885><s%>

"Then <S%G5119><s%> it goes, <S%G4198><s%> and takes <S%G3880><s%> along <S%G3880><s%> with it seven <S%G2033><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> more <S%G4190><s%> wicked <S%G4190><s%> than itself, <S%G1438><s%> and they go <S%G1525><s%> in and live <S%G2730><s%> there; <S%G1563><s%> and the last <S%G2078><s%> state of that man <S%G444><s%> becomes <S%G1096><s%> worse <S%G5501><s%> than the first. <S%G4413><s%> That is the way <S%G3779><s%> it will also <S%G2532><s%> be with this <S%G3778><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>"

While He was still <S%G2089><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> to the multitudes, <S%G3793><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> His mother <S%G3384><s%> and brothers <S%G80><s%> were standing <S%G2476><s%> outside, <S%G1854><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> to Him.

And someone <S%G5100><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Your mother <S%G3384><s%> and Your brothers <S%G80><s%> are standing <S%G2476><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> to You."
But He answered <S%G611><s%> the one who was telling <S%G3004><s%> Him and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> is My mother <S%G3384><s%> and who <S%G5101><s%> are My brothers <S%G80><s%>?"

And stretching <S%G1614><s%> out His hand <S%G5495><s%> toward <S%G1909><s%> His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> My mother <S%G3384><s%> and My brothers! <S%G80><s%>

"For whoever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> does <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of My Father <S%G3962><s%> who is in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> he is My brother <S%G80><s%> and sister <S%G79><s%> and mother. <S%G3384><s%>"
